Name: ethanol production from wood | electricity, high voltage | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Ethanol is produced by dilute acid pre-hydrolysis and simultaneous saccharification and co-fermentation (SSCF) of lignocellulosic biomass. Process heat and power supply is ensured by the combustion of unconverted solids. Excess electricity is exported to the power grid.
